title: Virtual Assistant – Operations & HR Support
description:
We are hiring a Virtual Assistant to support operations and data management for a start up company.



This role requires a high level of organization, attention to detail, and the ability to manage tasks with minimal supervision. You will be supporting day-to-day operations and helping maintain structure across workflows and internal processes.



This position is open to experienced applicants and entry-level candidates who are highly trainable, proactive, and able to take ownership of their work.



Schedule: 9:00 PM – 7:00 AM (Manila Time)



Key Responsibilities



Manage and update client and case records with accuracy

Prepare, format, and organize documents using Microsoft Word

Maintain structured filing systems and operational records

Perform quality checks to ensure data accuracy and consistency

Support internal operations and workflow management

Track tasks, updates, and ensure follow-through on assigned work

Handle sensitive information with confidentiality



Qualifications



Experience as a Virtual Assistant, Admin Assistant, or similar role is a plus

Strong Microsoft Word and document formatting skills

High attention to detail (non-negotiable)

Strong organizational and time management skills

Able to work independently and take initiative

Fast learner who can adapt quickly to systems and processes

Reliable internet and a distraction-free workspace



Growth & Opportunity



This role provides exposure to operations and structured internal processes beyond basic administrative work.



We welcome candidates who are serious about long-term growth. As you build trust and demonstrate consistent performance, you will have opportunities to take on more responsibilities and grow within the team.



We invest in individuals who are proactive, dependable, and committed to continuous improvement.



How to Apply



Send your resume with subject line:

"VA Operations - CV"



Applications that do not follow instructions will not be considered.

title: Experienced Video Editor (Short-Form & Long-Form, AI Knowledge Required)
description:
About Us



We are a pet care brand offering daycare, boarding, and grooming built around a wellness-first approach. We create educational content to help pet parents understand our core pillars and how these support their pets’ wellbeing.



What You’ll Do



Edit short-form videos (Instagram Reels, TikTok)

Edit long-form videos (YouTube educational content)

Create promotional and ad content for social media

Add subtitles and supporting visuals (stock, graphics, or AI)

Select appropriate music and follow brand guidelines

Coordinate with the team for smooth workflow



Why This Role Is Unique



Many care practices cannot be filmed directly. Your role is to make invisible processes understandable using visuals. AI knowledge is required — you will generate and integrate visuals to explain concepts clearly and naturally. The goal is clarity and educational storytelling, not flashy effects.



What We’re Looking For



Strong pacing and storytelling

Clear subtitle formatting

Ability to explain concepts visually using AI and other tools

Attention to detail and openness to feedback



Project-Based First

This starts as a trial project to see if it’s a good fit. If it works well, it can grow into part-time or full-time depending on workload.



How to Apply



Please send:



Resume

Portfolio link

3–5 video samples

Sample of AI-generated visuals



We look forward to seeing your work!

title: Social Media Manager
description:
We are a Canada-based digital media company specializing in managing and growing our clients’ social media presence. Our clients include aspiring influencers, adult content creators, and established personalities across various platforms.



We are currently seeking an experienced Social Media Manager to oversee one client’s SFW (safe-for-work) content across Instagram, Threads, X (formerly
), and TikTok. Content will be provided and ready for posting however, stories will need to be created and scheduled. Experience in social media marketing, as well as basic image and video editing, is considered a strong asset.



This position requires approximately 10–12 hours per week per client to start. The starting rate is USD $4 to $6 per hour. You will initially manage one client. Candidates who demonstrate initiative, creativity, strong performance, and the ability to take ownership and optimize processes without supervision will have the opportunity to manage additional clients, along with increased hours and compensation.



It's important you tell us why you are the right person for the job.



Requirements:

• Minimum of 2 years’ experience in social media management

• Strong understanding of Instagram, Threads, X, and TikTok

• Reliable, detail-oriented, and proactive



If you are currently seeking opportunities, please let us know the best way to contact you and your availability for an interview.



We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Email Copywriter (Klaviyo Focus) – Part Time to Start, Long Term Role
description:
About the Role

We are looking for a highly detail oriented
 Copywriter to join our growing
 marketingagency, In Flow Marketing.



We specialise in helping e-commerce brands increase their revenue through strategic
 marketing using Klaviyo.



This role is not about writing generic
s. It is about writing thoughtful, strategic
s that align with each client’s brand voice and business goals.



You will be working closely with our team to write campaigns and flow
s that drive engagement, retention, and sales.



This is a long term role with growth opportunities as the business continues to scale.

We are looking for someone reliable, proactive, and committed to growing with the team.

Responsibilities



Your responsibilities will include:

• Writing
 campaigns for e-commerce brands

• Writing
 flow
s (welcome, abandoned cart, post purchase, etc)

• Following brand voice guidelines for each client

• Reviewing client websites to understand their tone and positioning

• Writing clear, engaging, and conversion focused copy

• Editing and refining copy based on feedback

• Collaborating with our internal team (designers and strategist)

• Using AI tools such as ChatGPT to support writing when appropriate (while ensuring final copy is high quality and human sounding)



You will not be expected to design
s. Your focus is copywriting only.

Important: This is NOT a beginner role



We are looking for someone who:

• Has strong written English

• Has excellent attention to detail

• Can follow instructions carefully

• Takes ownership of their work

• Is reliable and consistent

• Is open to feedback and improving



Experience with
 marketing or Klaviyo is a bonus, but not required. We will provide training.



Required Skills

• Excellent written English

• Strong attention to detail

• Ability to match different brand voices

• Ability to follow structured processes

• Good communication

• Reliable internet connection



Preferred but Not Required

• Klaviyo experience



We care more about your ability and mindset than your experience.



Hours and Pay

• Starting at approximately 10 hours per week

• Opportunity to increase hours over time

• Flexible working hours

• Long term role



Hourly rate based on experience (AUD please)



About Us

In Flow Marketing is a fast growing
 marketing agency specialising in Klaviyo for e-commerce brands.



We focus on strategy, quality, and long term client relationships.

We have a supportive team environment and are looking for someone who wants to grow with us long term.



Application Instructions (IMPORTANT)



To apply, please do ALL of the following:

Start your application with the words: Purple



Answer this question:

If a brand sells premium skincare products, what tone would you use in their
s, and why?

Rewrite this sentence to make it more engaging:

“Our new products are now available.”



Include 2 to 3 examples of writing you have done (if available)



Applications that do not follow instructions will not be considered.

title: Senior eCommerce Bookkeeper (QBO & Ecom Focused)
description:
We’re an established eCommerce team that values high autonomy. We’re looking for a financial backbone. Someone who finds calm in perfectly reconciled books, enjoys the logic behind eCommerce accounting, and takes real ownership of the numbers. We value accuracy and accountability. We also value vibe. Both matter here.



You’ll thrive in this role if you:



- Have a solid grasp of COGS, inventory valuation, and payment processor reconciliations

- Are QBO-certified and hold a CPA or CB designation

- Are a self-starter who treats the books as if they were your own business

- Have hands-on experience with US GAAP and IRS policies specific to eCommerce



If this sounds like you, we’d love to meet you.



Logistics:



- Fully remote. We trust you to manage your time and deliver outcomes

- We use Slack for alignment. Comfort with camera-on financial review meetings is required

- We’re looking for a long-term partner, not a short-term freelancer



To apply, send a copy of your resume and answer these questions:



1. What are your hobbies?

2. What’s your ideal work environment, and how do you contribute to a great team culture?

3. What makes you stay in a company long-term?

4. What does being a ‘good teammate’ mean to you in a remote setup?

5. What’s a non-finance talent you have that your teammates would be surprised by?

title: Mobile Developer
description:
We're looking for a React Native Developer. You'll work side-by-side with our manager, designer, and team of engineer, helping and assisting with mobile app development, feature implementation, and testing.



What We're Looking For:

- Solid understanding of React Native fundamentals, such as components, state management, navigation, styling with Flexbox, and handling device-specific layouts.

- Experience in building user-friendly mobile experiences, including app flows, performance optimization, and ensuring seamless interactions across iOS and Android.

- Good code documentation skills – you can write clear, readable code and comments in a natural style, suitable for team collaboration, READMEs, and technical specs.



You also must:

- Always up to date with the latest trends, AI, tools, and best practices.

- Know how to research properly, which can include understanding project scope, analyzing competitor apps, profiling target users, and selecting the right libraries or tools.

- As this full remote position, you must be a good communicator. You need to present your work clearly, explain your decisions, and build proper prototypes or demos. 



Work setup

Company: 

Full remote

5pm - 1am PHT

Monthly contract with unlimited renewal



How to apply

tally.so/r/rjAoK2



Please request tally link via message after you apply.

Only applications submitted through tally link will be reviewed. This will include basic questions on skills you need to answer and a quick video intro to check your communication skills — resumes sent anywhere else will not be considered.

title: SEO Consultant
description:
About Us:

MageMontreal is a dynamic e-commerce consulting firm dedicated to providing top-notch solutions to our clients. As we expand our team, we are seeking a talented SEO Specialis to join us. This role will focus exclusively on SEO strategy and execution for the MageMontreal website. We offer a competitive base salary, fully remote work, an international work atmosphere, and endless growth opportunities.



Job Description:

The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in SEO, sales, and client-facing consulting, with the ability to develop and enhance our SEO offering, automate delivery processes, and drive profitability. This role will focus exclusively on SEO strategy and execution for the MageMontreal website. This is a remote freelance position with an estimated commitment of 10 hours per week, with the potential for full-time employment for the right candidate.



Responsibilities:

- Develop SEO Offering: Create and refine our SEO service offerings to meet client needs and market trends

- Templatize and Automate Services: Design and implement templates and automation processes to streamline service delivery and increase efficiency

- Sales and Client Management: Sell SEO services to existing clients and sales prospects, showcasing the value and impact of our offerings

- Team Management: Lead and manage a team of SEO executants, providing clear guidelines, performance reviews, and ongoing support

- Training: Train the team on the effective use of SEMRush and other SEO tools to ensure high-quality service delivery

- Profitability: Ensure the profitability of our e-commerce SEO services by managing resources effectively and optimizing service offerings



Requirements:

- Minimum of 5 years of experience in an SEO agency or as a freelance SEO consultant

- Proven sales experience with a strong ability to pitch and sell SEO services

- Extensive client-facing consulting experience

- Bilingual in French and English 

- Ability to work in the EST timezone (required)

- Excellent communication and leadership skills

- Proficiency in SEMRush and other SEO tools

- Strong organizational and project management skills



What’s In It for You:

- This is a fully remote position

- Minimum hours are not guaranteed

- Freelance contract for an estimated 10 hours per week to start

- Potential for a full-time employment contract for the right candidate



If you are a seasoned SEO professional with a passion for driving results and developing innovative solutions, we encourage you to apply. Join us and help take our SEO services to the next level!

title: AI Community Manager & Tech Coach
description:
We're looking for someone who lives and breathes AI.



You'll be the face of our OpenClaw community — running calls, coaching members, and helping people set up and get value from OpenClaw (an AI automation platform). 



You will be our CTO and receive a good percentage of the total income.



What you'll do:



• Host weekly calls with community members

• Coach people 1-on-1 on OpenClaw setup, security, and use cases

• Explain technical concepts in simple terms anyone can understand

• Spend hours daily learning about AI — new tools, workflows, use cases

• Find and document real use cases for OpenClaw

• Build and grow our Skool community

• Create guides, tutorials, and resources

You must be:



• Fluent in English (spoken + written) — you'll be on camera and on calls

• Outgoing and comfortable talking to people

• A natural teacher — can break down complex topics simply

• Deeply interested in AI (not just "I've used ChatGPT")

• Self-driven — you research, learn, and build without being told

• Available for calls across multiple time zones

title: Freelance Videographer, AI Commercial Advertising (E commerce)
description:
Contract: Freelance

Availability: Part time, on demand

Location: Remote, international (French fluency required)

Languages: French and English (bilingual delivery required)



Job description:

We are an e commerce agency producing conversion focused advertising content for our own brand and for clients. We are looking for a freelance videographer with proven commercial advertising experience and strong hands on experience creating videos using AI tools.



Your role will focus on creating short, high impact ad videos for Google Ads, YouTube Ads, and LinkedIn Ads, with bilingual (French and English) deliverables.



This role is ideal for a videographer who understands performance marketing, modern creative workflows, and AI powered production, and who stays current as tools evolve.



What you will do:

• Produce short form commercial advertising videos (6 to 60 seconds)

• Create promotional videos for services, case studies, and campaigns

• Deliver bilingual video assets (French and English)

• Use AI tools to generate or enhance video content (visuals and voice)

• Edit and finalize videos using professional editing software

• Adapt formats and messaging for Google, YouTube, and LinkedIn

• Iterate quickly based on feedback and campaign needs



Required experience:

Mandatory

• Commercial video production experience

• Professional use of AI for video creation

• Strong video editing and post production skills

• Fluent French (spoken and written)

• Ability to work independently and meet deadlines



Nice to have

• Experience with e commerce brands or digital agencies

• Familiarity with performance marketing and ad creative

• Experience with AI avatars, generative visuals, synthetic voice



Tools (current stack and expectations):

You are expected to be comfortable with most of the following, and willing to learn new tools as AI capabilities evolve:



AI video generation

• Google Veo 3.1

• Sora

• Other AI video tools as required over time



AI voice generation

• ElevenLabs



Editing and motion

• Premiere Pro, After Effects, DaVinci Resolve, or equivalent

• Motion graphics and animation tools

• Audio editing and voice over integration



Budget:

Open to hourly rates or per project pricing.

Please include your typical rate structure in your proposal.



How to apply (important):

Your proposal must include:



- A portfolio of traditional videos (real footage, classic editing)

- A portfolio of AI generated or AI assisted videos

- A clear label indicating which videos are traditional and which are AI

- A short explanation of how AI was used in your AI video examples



Proposals without this separation will not be reviewed.

title: Video Editor for True Crime YouTube Channel
description:
We are looking for a reliable, skilled video editor to join our team and edit videos for our true crime YouTube channel.



Example channel for reference style:





You’re a great fit if:

- You’re self-motivated and meet deadlines consistently (2-3 days per video).

title: Executive Assistant + Ops Coordinator
description:
We’re hiring an Operations EA / Workflow Manager to run the CEO’s daily command center: inbox triage, calendar management, task routing, project tracking, and basic automation monitoring (Make/Integromat). You’ll help keep multiple business lanes moving (credit operations, real estate wholesaling, content, and automation).



This role is for someone who is fast, organized, and proactive. You don’t need to be an expert in credit or real estate—but you must be excellent at systems, follow-through, and clean communication.



Responsibilities



Daily Command Center



Triage
s and categorize (Bills, CRA/Credit, Contracts, GoHighLevel, Vendors, Other)



Calendar scheduling, confirmations, reminders, agendas



Convert messages/notes into tasks (Airtable/Trello) with owners + due dates



Maintain an “Open Loops / Waiting On / Blockers” tracker updated daily



Send a daily CEO briefing (AM) + recap (EOD)



Systems & Automation Support



Keep Airtable/Trello clean and up-to-date (statuses, links, deadlines)



Monitor Make scenarios for failures; report issues clearly (what broke, screenshot, recommended fix)



Document simple SOP checklists as we standardize workflows



Admin/Ops Coordination



Draft replies using templates (CEO approves sensitive items)



Coordinate handoffs with other VAs (credit processor, sales VA)



Organize Google Drive folders (naming + filing)



Required Skills (must-have)



Executive assistant or operations VA experience (2+ years preferred)



Strong written English and clear communication



Excellent organization + deadline discipline



Airtable or Trello (must be comfortable)



Google Workspace (Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Docs)



Slack (daily communication)



Bonus Skills (nice-to-have)



Make (Integromat) or Zapier automation monitoring



GoHighLevel familiarity (pipelines, tags, tasks)



Experience supporting sales ops or client-based services



Deliverables (non-negotiable)



Daily CEO Brief (AM)



Daily Open Loops list (EOD)



Weekly Planning Pack (priorities + deadlines + risks)





To Apply



Reply with:



A short summary of your EA/Ops experience



The tools you’ve used (Airtable/Trello/Make/GHL)



Your internet speed + workspace setup



Confirm you can work with US Eastern overlap



Include the word “COMMANDCENTER” in your first line

title: Go High Level Automation Specialist at Market Leaders
description:
Go High Level Automation Specialist

Company: Market Leaders

Location: Remote (Philippines/Anywhere)

Salary: SGD $800–1,200/month (based on experience)


/testimonial-page



Who We Are

Market Leaders is on a mission to become a world-renowned coaching and marketing education brand by 2031. We bring Asian wisdom to global business education—think Bruce Lee's philosophy meets world-class marketing execution.



Our culture? Peaceful & Profitable. High performance, zero drama. Team-first, always.

We’re a 7-person remote team building something extraordinary—and we need someone who gets it.



The Opportunity

We’re looking for a Go High Level Automation Specialist who doesn’t just build workflows but acts as an architect of client transformation.



This isn’t a “set it and forget it” role. You’ll work directly with clients helping them build Peaceful & Profitable businesses through intelligent automation. Your work will touch thousands of entrepreneurs across Asia and beyond.



What makes this role unique:

Direct client impact: Your automations change real businesses

Creative + technical blend: Strategy AND execution

Cultural mission: Help people build better businesses

World-class team: Learn from (and teach) exceptional humans

Remote freedom: Work from anywhere, quarterly team retreats in amazing Asian locations



What You’ll Do

Design and build sophisticated Go High Level automations for coaching/education clients (funnels, workflows,
 sequences, calendars, pipelines)

Own client relationships from strategy to implementation to optimization

Translate business goals into automated systems that drive real results

Document processes and create SOPs to help the team level up

Collaborate with strategists and content creators to deliver integrated solutions

Stay ahead of GHL updates and bring innovations to client work

Contribute to team knowledge through training, documentation, and mentorship



What You Bring



Must-Haves:



Technical Skills:

2+ years hands-on experience with Go High Level (workflows, funnels,
 automation)

Proven ability to build complex, multi-step automations (show examples)

Understanding of marketing funnels, lead nurture, and sales processes

Comfortable with APIs, webhooks, and integrations (Zapier, custom code)

Strong problem-solving skills (debug confidently)



Communication & Collaboration:

Excellent written and verbal English (direct client communication)

Ability to explain technical concepts simply (teaching mindset)

Proactive communicator (update without being asked)

Async-first work style (remote team across timezones)



Cultural Fit (Non-Negotiable):

High performance, zero drama - excellent at what you do AND a joy to work with

Team-first mentality - collaboration over ego

Continuous learner - always evolving

World-class standards - quality is non-negotiable, details matter

Peaceful & Profitable believer - reject hustle culture, value sustainable excellence



Nice-to-Haves:

Experience with coaching/education industry

Copywriting skills 
 sequences, funnel copy)

Design sense (UX/conversion principles)

Previous remote work experience (disciplined, self-directed)

Based in Asia or comfortable with Asian timezone overlap



Why Market Leaders?



Peaceful & Profitable Culture:

No all-nighters, performative hustle, or “rise and grind” BS

Clear boundaries, real vacation, team respects your time



Remote-First, Human-Centered:

Work from anywhere

Quarterly in-person retreats (Bangkok, Bali, Tokyo, etc.)

Connect deeply with teammates



Growth Path:

Skill training, leadership opportunities, expanding responsibilities

Where you grow, we grow



Team Culture You’ll Enjoy:

Weekly wins celebrated (all progress matters)

Quarterly retreats in rotating Asian locations

No brilliant jerks policy

Open communication, disagree without drama

Real work-life balance modeled from leadership



Compensation & Perks



Salary: SGD $800–1,200/month (based on experience)

Fully remote (work from anywhere)

Quarterly team retreats (3-4 days, expenses covered)

Flexible schedule (async-first, deep work protected)



Apply Now!

title: SEO Strategist & Account Manager
description:
Hawk IQ is a U.S.-based digital marketing agency that helps small businesses grow smarter and faster through data-driven SEO strategies, website optimization, AI Visibility (GEO) and Google Business Profile (GBP) management. We work with the Go High Level (GHL) CRM platform. We focus on clients needing Websites, CRM, Content Creation, Local & AI Visibility. 



We are expanding our remote team in the Philippines.



ROLE OVERVIEW:

We are hiring a proactive leader and skilled SEO Strategist to join our team. This role combines local Search Engine Optimization & AI strategy experience, client management, and continuous learning.



Initial responsibilities will require account management until revenues require an account manager. This role, with the right leadership skills, will have the opportunity to build a team and be responsible for its growth and profitability. The ideal candidate will be compensated well for that work. 



RESPONSIBILITIES:

 - Optimize Client Google Business Profiles (GBP) & AI Visibility (AIO / GEO) 

 - Conduct SEO audits, KW research, and competitor analysis for prospective clients

 - Implement on-page, off-page, and technical SEO strategies

 - Create backlinks and manage link-building campaigns

 - Manage and oversee SEO-friendly content

 - Coordinate client campaigns and reporting

 - Proactively stay updated on SEO and Google algorithm changes



QUALIFICATIONS:

- 2+ years SEO experience (small business preferred)

 - Strong knowledge of GBP optimization, on-page & off-page SEO

 - Experience with SEO tools (GA4, GTM, GSC, SEMrush, Ahrefs, etc.)

 - Excellent English communication skills

 - Organized and able to manage multiple clients

 - Google Sheets, Docs & Go High Level CRM experience required 



COMPENSATION & BENEFITS:

 - First 30 days (Trial): $650 USD

 - 60–90 days (Advanced Trial): $850 USD

 - 90–180 days (Full Employment after performance of skills): $1,050 - $1,250 / month (QTR Bonus based on performance reviews) 

 - Long-term, remote position with growth opportunities

 - Flexible hours (must overlap some U.S. time)

 - Candidate responsible for own ongoing training and development



IMPORTANT REQUIREMENTS:

 - Must work exclusively for Hawk IQ (no other agency / freelance work allowed)

 - Reliable internet connection with backup

 - Full focus and dedication to Hawk IQ clients



WHY JOIN US?

Be part of a growing digital marketing agency where your skills directly impact small business success. If you prove your work and skill, you will be compensated above PH market rates. If you are ready to grow your career in Digital Marketing, help build a great team and earn a competitive salary, we want to hear from you!

title: Senior Bookkeeper *Superstar Only*
description:
We are looking for two experienced bookkeepers to join our finance team and take ownership of expense categorization, transaction reconciliation, accounts payable, and invoice processing across multiple legal entities.



The bookkeepers will work closely with the CFO, ensuring that all financial transactions are accurately recorded, categorized, and reconciled on a regular basis. This role is ideal for someone who is detail-oriented, organized, and comfortable managing financial data across multiple platforms — including Xero, Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and our custom CRM.



Key Responsibilities

- Categorize all expenses and transactions in Xero, ensuring accurate classification for reporting and compliance

- Reconcile transactions across multiple payment platforms, including Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRM tools

- Manage accounts payable, ensuring all invoices are properly reviewed, recorded, and scheduled for payment

- Assist with invoice processing, ensuring all vendor invoices are accurately documented and match purchase orders where applicable

- Work closely with the CFO to provide up-to-date financial records for monthly, quarterly, and annual reporting

- Ensure all financial data is accurate and properly organized to support compliance across multiple jurisdictions

- Flag discrepancies or unusual transactions for review by the CFO



What We’re Looking For

- At least 5 years of experience in bookkeeping and expense reconciliation

- Strong proficiency in Xero

- Experience working with Stripe, PayPal, Shopify, and custom CRMs

- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

- Experience handling multi-entity, multi-currency financial data preferred

- Comfortable working in a remote-first environment

- Fluent in English, both written and spoken



Requirements for Effective Remote Work

- Reliable computer or laptop capable of photo and video editing

- Stable high-speed internet connection

- Conducive work environment



Working Schedule

- Full-time opportunity

- Remote work setup (Philippines-based applicants only)



Benefits

- Competitive pay

- Training and growth opportunities

- Opportunity to work with a fast-growing content-driven company



Salary range

- Php 40,000 - Php 65,000 (based on experience)



Application Instructions

Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here is what to do next:



Please go to the link below, review the questions carefully, and share the required information.






If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: Marketing Assistant
description:
We are seeking a highly organised and creative Marketing Assistant to support our marketing team in delivering high-quality sales and marketing materials. This role is ideal for someone with strong design and document production skills who enjoys working across a variety of content formats and supporting commercial initiatives.

The successful candidate will play a key role in maintaining brand consistency while producing professional documentation and visual materials that support business growth.

________________________________________

Key Responsibilities

• Create and update product data sheets in line with brand guidelines

• Assist in the preparation and formatting of sales proposals

• Develop engaging and professional PowerPoint presentations

• Draft and design compelling written case studies

• Maintain and update price lists, ensuring accuracy and consistency

• Ensure all materials are aligned with company branding and messaging

• Support the wider marketing team with ad hoc content and design tasks

________________________________________

Skills & Experience

Essential

• Confident user of Microsoft PowerPoint and Word

• Strong written communication skills with attention to detail

• Excellent formatting and document layout skills

• Highly organised with the ability to manage multiple projects





Desirable / Nice to Have

• Experience using Adobe Creative Suite, particularly InDesign

• Experience working with Canva

• Previous experience in a marketing or design support role

________________________________________

Personal Attributes

• Creative with a strong eye for detail

• Proactive and able to work independently

• Strong time management skills

• Positive, flexible and willing to support wider team initiatives



Time Zone required: UK standard time

All candidates need to submit a maximum 2 minute video introduction about themselves.

title: Google Ads & Landing Page Support Virtual Assistant
description:
We are a digital marketing agency looking for a detail-oriented Google Ads & Landing Page Support Assistant to help our Google Ads Manager with day-to-day tasks. This is an administrative/implementation role, not a senior strategist position.



Key Responsibilities

Google Ads administrative support



Assist with basic campaign setup (creating campaigns, ad groups, ads, adding keywords, extensions from provided structures or templates).



Make minor budget and bid changes as directed by the Google Ads Manager.



Perform daily/weekly account checks (disapproved ads, limited by budget, tracking issues, sudden drops in impressions or conversions).



Reporting and monitoring



Pull performance reports from Google Ads and Analytics (CTR, CPC, CPA, conversions, etc.).



Update report templates and dashboards with fresh data.



Flag notable changes or anomalies to the Google Ads Manager (e.g., big jumps in cost, conversions going down, new disapprovals).



Google support, policy, and verification



Open and manage support tickets with Google for disapprovals, policy questions, and technical issues.



Handle verification processes (business, advertiser, identity) following internal SOPs.



Keep organized records of all support interactions and outcomes.



Landing page and tracking support



Make minor edits to existing landing pages in Instapage, Unbounce, Webflow, and WordPress (text changes, image swaps, simple layout tweaks).



Add or update tracking scripts, pixels, and tags as instructed (e.g., Google tags, conversion tracking).



Nice-to-have: Help build new landing pages using templates or builders under guidance from the team.



Requirements

5+ years of full-time experience in a digital marketing, advertising, or virtual assistant role with regular exposure to Google Ads.



Comfortable working inside Google Ads: navigating the interface, updating campaigns, pulling data, and following clear instructions.



Basic understanding of performance metrics (impressions, clicks, CTR, CPC, conversions, CPA).



Experience with at least one of the following: Instapage, Unbounce, Webflow, or WordPress; able to make minor content and layout edits.



Basic HTML/CSS knowledge sufficient for small changes and troubleshooting simple layout issues.



Strong English communication skills (written and spoken).



Reliable internet connection and ability to work with some overlap in US business hours.



Nice-to-Have

Experience assisting with Google Ads account issues, policy disapprovals, or verification processes.



Prior work in an agency or in a support/assistant role for media buyers or marketing managers.



Experience building landing pages from templates and following simple CRO best practices.



Personal Attributes

Very detail-oriented and organized; comfortable working with numbers and checklists.



Follows instructions and SOPs accurately, but asks questions when something is unclear.



Responsive, reliable, and able to meet deadlines.



Comfortable working in tools like Slack,
, and a project management system (e.g., Asana/ClickUp/Trello).



How to Apply

Please apply through OnlineJobs.ph and include:



Your CV/resume.



A short note about your Google Ads experience (what you actually do day-to-day).



A brief description of which landing page tools you’ve used (Instapage, Unbounce, Webflow, WordPress) and what kind of edits you can do.



Answer this question in your message:



“What is one common Google Ads issue you’ve handled before (e.g., disapproval, tracking, verification), and how did you fix it?”



We will only review applications that follow all instructions above.

title: Bookkeeper – Irish Construction Clients (Remote, Philippines)
description:
About Us

We are a growing tax compliance practice based in Ireland, specialising in serving the construction industry.

 We're looking for a reliable, detail-oriented bookkeeper to join our team remotely.

The Role

You will handle monthly bookkeeping for Irish limited companies and sole traders in the construction sector. Your main responsibilities include:



Bank reconciliation in QuickBooks Online (weekly/monthly)

Categorising transactions accurately

Creating invoices based on RCT (Relevant Contracts Tax) payment notifications – we'll train you on this

Managing Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable

Preparing monthly financial reports

Communicating with clients to request missing documents



This is ongoing, steady work – not a one-time project.

Requirements

Must Have:



QuickBooks Online experience (minimum 2 years) – ProAdvisor certification is a plus

Bank reconciliation experience (minimum 2 years)

AP/AR experience (minimum 2 years)

Strong Excel/Google Sheets skills

Fluent English (written and spoken)

Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field

Reliable internet connection

Available for at least 4-6 hours/day (flexible schedule)



Nice to Have:



Experience with construction industry clients

Experience with Irish or UK accounting



What We Offer



Long-term, stable work with room to grow

Flexible hours – no fixed schedule, we care about results

Training on Irish RCT system and our processes

Payment via EasyPay (weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly – your choice)

Direct communication via WhatsApp/email (open to Slack/Teams)



Compensation

Hourly rate, negotiable based on experience. We may start with a small paid test task to assess fit.

How to Apply

Please reply with:



Your CV highlighting QuickBooks and bookkeeping experience

Your hourly rate expectation

Your availability (hours per day/week)

One sentence: Why are you a good fit for this role?



We usually respond within 1-2 working days.

title: Editorial Illustrator — Business Book Chapter Visuals
description:
I am the author of a business leadership book ("Dialogue of Work") 

currently in production. I need a creative illustrator to produce 

15 original editorial illustrations that bring key storytelling 


nts to life.



IMPORTANT: Unlike our infographic work, these visuals are created 

from scratch based on scene descriptions. They require creative 

interpretation, warmth, and human storytelling — not just technical 

execution.



THE WORK:

- 15 editorial illustrations for narrative 
nts in the book

- Examples of scenes: a leader and worker walking through a park 

  in Berlin, a circle of 15 people in a garden in Malaga, Spain, 

  a nursing home resident caring for a small potted plant, a 

  young professional in a Korean restaurant, an analytics expert 

  in deep concentration

- Each illustration comes with a written scene description and 

  the relevant book excerpt for context



STYLE REQUIREMENTS:

- Warm, professional, human — think editorial illustration for 

  Harvard Business Review or a Malcolm Gladwell book

- Abstract or semi-abstract figures (no hyper-realistic portraits)

- Color palette: 6 specific colors provided in style guide

- Must feel cohesive — all 15 illustrations from the same visual world

- Must work in grayscale for print fallback

- Book format: 6"×9", visuals up to 4.5" wide



DELIVERABLES:

- High-resolution PNG or SVG files (300 DPI minimum)

- Each illustration sized for print

- Consistent style across all 15 pieces



PROCESS:

- Week 1: Paid test task — one illustration from a provided 

  scene description

- If test passes: proceed with full project in batches of 3-4

- Feedback given within 24 hours per batch

- Maximum 2 revision rounds per illustration



SKILLS NEEDED:

- Strong editorial or conceptual illustration portfolio

- Experience illustrating human scenes and emotions

- Ability to work within a defined color palette and style guide

- Good English (for reading scene descriptions and book excerpts)

- Experience with print-ready file preparation preferred



TIMELINE: Approximately 8-10 weeks, flexible.



Please include 3-5 portfolio samples showing editorial or 

character-based illustration work when you apply. Applications 

without portfolio samples will not be considered.

title: DTC Graphic Designer - Static Ad Specialist
description:
LivingRoot, a rapidly scaling science-backed supplement and consumer products brand, is seeking a talented graphic designer to create high-converting static image ads for our product lines. We've built our brand to over 1,000 orders in recent weeks through compelling visual content and innovative marketing.

Your mission is to create scroll-stopping static image ads for our astaxanthin supplements, hair growth serums, and weighted sleep masks. You'll produce direct-response ad creatives that drive conversions across
, Instagram, and TikTok.

Responsibilities:



Produce 5 high-quality static image ads per day following brand guidelines and proven direct-response formulas

Create product-focused ads, benefit-driven creatives, before/after visuals, and testimonial graphics

Apply direct-response design principles to maximize click-through rates and conversions

Maintain brand consistency across all static ad assets

Source stock images, icons, and visual elements as needed

Analyze ad performance metrics to optimize future designs

Work autonomously while meeting daily deadlines



Requirements:



Proven experience creating static ads for DTC/e-commerce brands

Proficiency in Canva Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or similar design software

Understanding of direct-response marketing and what drives conversions in paid social ads

Strong typography, layout, and color theory skills

Ability to source high-quality stock imagery and visual assets

Excellent attention to detail and ability to follow creative briefs

Self-starter mentality with strong communication skills

DetailsMatter - ability to deliver quality work consistently on tight deadlines

title: WordPress Front-End Developer (Full-Time, Long-Term)
description:
Who We Are

We are a full-service interactive digital agency based in Southern California, working with clients all over the world. We are a passionate team of entrepreneurs in an established, growing agency focused on custom website development, design, SEO, mobile, and content marketing. You can learn more about us at: 



We’re looking for a reliable, detail-oriented WordPress Front-End Developer to join our remote team long-term.



Who You Are

You are an experienced front-end developer who enjoys building and maintaining modern, responsive WordPress websites. You are comfortable turning Figma/wireframes into clean, functional pages, and you care about code quality, layout accuracy, and user experience.



You will work closely with our design and development teams to create and maintain high-quality websites for our clients.



What You’ll Do

Build and maintain WordPress websites



Convert designs (Figma/wireframes/mockups) into responsive WordPress pages.



Implement themes and child themes, customize layouts, and configure plugins.



Make front-end updates: content changes, layout tweaks, styling adjustments.



Front-end development



Write clean, efficient HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for landing pages and site components.



Ensure cross-browser and cross-device compatibility.



Implement responsive design best practices for mobile, tablet, and desktop.



Quality & collaboration



Debug and fix layout or front-end issues as they arise.



Collaborate with designers, project managers, and other developers.



Follow internal standards, naming conventions, and simple documentation.



Must-Have Skills & Experience

5+ years of professional full-time experience in front-end web development.



Strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.



Extensive hands-on experience developing and updating WordPress sites (themes, page builders, plugins).



Proven experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.



Experience using version control (Git or similar).



Good written and spoken English; comfortable communicating in a remote team environment.



Bonus Points (Nice to Have)

Prior work experience with a digital agency.



Experience working in the medical/healthcare space, especially aesthetics, plastic surgery, or behavioral health.



Hands-on experience with Webflow as well as WordPress.



Figma experience (reading designs, exporting assets, understanding layout).



Experience with Wrike or other project management tools (Asana, ClickUp, Jira, etc.).



Code bootcamp or self-taught background is welcome; a college degree is not required.



Work Setup & Benefits

Full-time, long-term position (not a short-term freelance gig).



Stable workload with an established agency and ongoing client projects.



Opportunity to learn, grow, and take on more responsibility over time.



How to Apply (Read Carefully – Simple Test)

To help us find candidates who pay attention to detail and read the full job post, please follow all of these steps:



Apply through OnlineJobs.ph with your resume/CV.



In your subject line, include:



WordPress Dev – [Your Name] – IM2025

(Example: WordPress Dev – Juan Dela Cruz – IM2025)



In the first line of your message, answer this question:



“Which WordPress-related task do you feel strongest at, and why?”



Include links to 3–5 live WordPress sites you worked on and briefly describe your role in each (what you actually did).



Tell us which tools you’ve used: WordPress, Webflow, Figma, Git, and any page builders (e.g., Elementor, WPBakery, Gutenberg, etc.).

title: Acquisitions Associate (Property Management)
description:
Role Overview

The Acquisitions Associate is responsible for building and managing Parity’s property acquisition pipeline. This role owns the front end of the development funnel: identifying absentee owners of vacant and distressed properties, maintaining a clean and accurate owner database, conducting outbound outreach, and negotiating purchase terms that align with Parity’s mission and financial parameters. This is a hands-on role that blends data management, outbound communication, negotiation, and coordination with legal and development teams.



Key Responsibilities

1. Acquisition Pipeline & Database Management

• Build, maintain, and continuously clean a database of absentee owners of vacant and distressed properties.

• Aggregate and verify ownership data from public records, tax data, and third-party sources.

• Track owner status, outreach history, responsiveness, and deal stage in Parity’s CRM or database.

• Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency across systems.



2. Owner Outreach & Relationship Management

• Execute outbound outreach campaigns via phone,
, and direct mail.

• Respond to inbound inquiries from property owners.

• Build rapport with owners and clearly communicate Parity’s mission, process, and timelines.

• Maintain consistent follow-up to move owners through the decision-making process.

3. Deal Evaluation & Negotiation

• Conduct preliminary deal screening based on location, condition, and feasibility.

• Negotiate purchase price and basic terms within pre-approved parameters.

• Coordinate property walk-throughs and inspections with internal teams.

• Prepare internal deal summaries and recommendations.

4. Transaction Coordination

• Work closely with legal counsel, title companies, and internal staff through contract and closing.

• Track deal milestones and ensure timely progression to settlement.

• Maintain organized records of contracts, correspondence, and transaction documents.

5. Process Improvement & Reporting

• Help refine acquisition workflows, templates, and outreach scripts.

• Track and report on key metrics such as outreach volume, response rates, conversions, and acquisitions.

• Identify bottlenecks and propose improvements to increase acquisition velocity.



Required Qualifications

• 2–5 years of experience in real estate, acquisitions, development, sales, or a related field.

• Strong organizational skills and comfort managing large datasets.

• Experience with outbound outreach (calls,
s, mail campaigns).

• Demonstrated negotiation skills and comfort having direct financial conversations.

• Clear, professional written and verbal communication.

• High attention to detail and follow-through.

• Experience with property acquisition.

• CRM and database experience (Airtable, HubSpot, etc.).

• Comfort working in a mission-driven, fast-paced environment.



Compensation, Growth, and Benefits

• Competitive compensation commensurate with experience

• Opportunity for performance-based bonuses as the company grows

• Direct mentorship from the founder and CEO

• 21 days of paid time off

title: Content Writer / Communications Associate (No AI, Manual Writing)
description:
Parity Homes is seeking a creative and detail-oriented Content Writer / Communications Associate to support our growing need for high-quality written content across marketing, sales, and internal communications. In this role, you will craft clear and compelling messaging that strengthens our brand voice, deepens client engagement, and supports internal alignment across teams.



We are more than a homebuilder; we are reimagining how neighborhoods are valued and invested in. Our work centers on transforming long-abandoned Baltimore rowhomes into pathways to wealth and resilience for historically marginalized communities. Every tea
mber contributes to this mission--including through the stories we tell and the messages we share.



Key Responsibilities

High-Quality Written Content

Produce engaging content for
s, newsletters, blog posts, website pages, sales materials, and lead magnets.

Maintain a consistent brand voice across all communication channels.

Deliver polished, error-free writing with strong grammar, structure, and tone.



Internal & External Communications

Draft internal memos, updates, and documents to strengthen company-wide communication.

Create templates, announcements, and onboarding materials for client communication.

Develop and refine SOPs, handbooks, and process documentation.



Marketing & Social Media Support

Write and schedule social media content to improve engagement and brand visibility.

Support messaging for campaigns, content calendars, captions, and storytelling.

Contribute creative direction for messaging angles and content themes.



Brand & Messaging Alignment

Ensure all written materials reflect Parity Homes' values, voice, and brand standards.

Maintain messaging guidelines, templates, and communication frameworks.

Collaborate with leadership to refine tone, value propositions, and messaging pillars.



Research & Insights

Conduct topic, keyword, and competitor research to support content strategy.

Stay current on trends in real estate, construction, and residential development.

Translate complex concepts into simple, engaging, audience-friendly messages.



Process & Quality Improvement

Implement proofreading, version tracking, and review workflows to ensure quality.

Recommend improvements to messaging processes and documentation systems.

Support cross-functional teams with ad hoc writing needs and special projects.



Qualifications

Required

5+ years of experience in content writing, communications, or marketing.

Portfolio with strong writing samples (marketing,
, long-form, or internal communications).

Excellent command of English with strong grammar, editing, and storytelling skills.

Ability to write in multiple tones--professional, conversational, technical, and brand-driven.

Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple deadlines.

Comfortable working in a fast-paced, fully remote environment.

Strong research skills and ability to learn real estate, construction, or operational topics.



Preferred

Has experience working EST Business Hours

Experience in public relations, press, or external communications.

Familiarity with HubSpot, ClickUp, Google Workspace, or content management tools.

Experience with
 marketing, newsletters, or social media content planning.

Basic understanding of SEO principles and keyword usage.



Compensation, Growth, and Benefits

Competitive compensation based on experience.

Opportunity for performance-based bonuses as the company grows.

Direct mentorship from the Founder and CEO.

20 days of paid time off.

title: Digital Illustrator & Graphic Designer  (Illustrator, Photoshop, and AI like Midjourney)
description:
Role Overview

We’re looking for a creative and tech-savvy AI Artist to join our fully remote team at Mutual Paper. In this role, you’ll leverage generative AI tools to bring bold ideas to life through visuals, illustrations, and digital assets. You’ll collaborate with the founder and team to craft engaging content that elevates our brand and client projects, blending artistry with cutting-edge AI technology.



Key Outcomes

Deliver high-quality AI-generated artwork weekly that reflects Moonlight’s brand voice and meets project briefs, including marketing assets, social media content, and client-facing visuals.

Build and maintain a visual library of AI-generated assets that can be reused and repurposed across different campaigns, ensuring consistency in brand style and saving design time for future projects.

Experiment with and document best practices for AI art tools (e.g., MidJourney, Stable Diffusion, DALL·E), creating a repeatable process for prompt engineering, editing, and final output.

Collaborate with the marketing and recruitment teams to produce visuals that enhance campaigns, storytelling, and candidate engagement, delivering at least 3–4 unique creative sets per month.

Continuously push creative boundaries by proposing and testing new applications of AI art for brand storytelling, such as animations, branded templates, or multimedia experiments, with a goal of presenting at least one innovative idea each month.

Ensure timely delivery and revisions of all creative assets, meeting deadlines for campaigns, launches, and external client projects without compromising quality.

Vector & Type Posters: Design clean, modular poster systems (Bauhaus, geometric, text-art) using grids, precise typography, and scalable vector workflows.

Multi-Ratio Masters: Build 3:4 masters and adapt to 2:3 and 1:1 (e.g., 24×32 ? 24×36 ? 24×24) while preserving composition and hierarchy.

Print Production: Deliver press-ready assets (PDF/X with bleed), manage CMYK/spot/ICC profiles, outline/safeguard fonts, and export SVGs for web.

Photoreal Mockups: Composite frames into interiors (living rooms, bedrooms, offices) with believable lighting, reflections, grain, shadows, and scale.

Brand & Systems: Extend color/typography systems into ads, landing sections, and
 assets; maintain reusable templates and naming hygiene.

QA & Delivery: Versioning across sizes/ratios, final checks on crops, margins, ink coverage, overprint preview, and export specs.



Qualifications

Proven experience in digital art, illustration, or design (portfolio required)

Hands-on experience with AI art platforms (e.g., MidJourney, Stable Diffusion, DALL·E, or similar tools)

Strong creative vision with the ability to translate abstract concepts into compelling visuals

Knowledge of graphic design principles and attention to detail

Self-motivated, adaptable, and comfortable working in a fast-paced, remote environment

Adobe Illustrator (expert): vector systems, type composition, grid construction, poster production.

Adobe Photoshop (expert): retouching, compositing, texture/grain, photoreal staging.

Typography fundamentals: kerning, tracking, leading, optical vs metrics, OpenType features, baseline grids.

Color management for print (CMYK/spot, ICC) and web (sRGB/WebP); confident with PDF/X standards and print bleeds.

File hygiene: structured layers, styles, components, and clear versioning



Bonus: Familiarity with print-on-demand (Printful/Printify/Gelato) and pre-press basics (ink limits, trapping).

title: VA GHL EXPERT
description:
Role Overview

We are seeking a high-level GoHighLevel (GHL) Expert who is also a versatile Virtual Assistant to join our team. You will be the technical backbone of our marketing automation while managing the day-to-day flow of
 support and lead generation activities. This role requires a blend of technical GHL mastery, professional communication, and proactive lead management.



Key Responsibilities

1. GoHighLevel (GHL) Management

System Architecture: Build and optimize full-scale sub-accounts, including funnels, websites, and membership areas.



Automation: Create complex workflows and triggers to automate lead nurturing, appointment booking, and internal notifications.



Troubleshooting: Act as the primary point of contact for technical glitches, API integrations (Zapier), and domain issues.



Reporting: Set up and maintain dashboards to track conversion rates and campaign performance.



2.
 & Lead Support

Inbox Management: Monitor and respond to customer support
s with a high degree of professionalism and empathy.



Lead Nurturing: Engage with incoming leads via GHL conversations 
/SMS) to qualify them and book appointments.



CRM Hygiene: Ensure all lead data is accurately tagged, updated, and moved through the appropriate pipeline stages.



3. LinkedIn Lead Generation

Prospecting: Use tools (e.g., Sales Navigator, HeyReach, or Expandi) to identify and reach out to target prospects.



Engagement: Handle initial LinkedIn outreach and follow-ups, bridging the gap between LinkedIn and our GHL ecosystem.



Lead Handoff: Ensure high-quality LinkedIn leads are synced into the CRM for the sales team.



Required Skills & Qualifications

Certified GHL Expertise: Minimum 2+ years of intensive experience specifically with GoHighLevel.



Tech Stack Proficiency: Skilled in Zapier, Slack, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, and basic Canva (for quick funnel assets).



Communication: Exceptional written and verbal English skills. You must be able to write "on-brand" copy for support and outreach.



Lead Gen Savvy: Proven experience in managing outbound lead generation and cold outreach workflows.



Work Style: Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to work independently in a fast-paced remote environment.



Why Join Us?

Full-Time Stability: Consistent 40 hours per week with long-term growth potential.



Remote Freedom: Work from anywhere with a stable internet connection.



Collaborative Culture: Be a core part of a growing team where your technical input is valued.

title: Appointment Setter (Full-Time) Mountain Standard Time
description:
High Ticket Appointment Setter (Full-Time) Mountain Standard Time

THIS IS FOR YOU IF YOU ARE:

- Driven and tenacious

- Have the willingness to help others grow

- Thrive off challenges and targets

- Self-accountable and responsible

- Have a never-quit mindset

- Have a continuous learning attitude

- Will do what it takes to reach your goals



ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS:

- You can work at least 30 - 40 hours a week in the MST

- You have a full command and are fluent in both written and spoken ENGLISH

- You are coachable

- You have the eagerness to learn on the job

- You follow directions well

- You have excellent time management skills

- You are familiar with
, Instagram, and Linkedin.

- You already have a solid personal profile on these platforms



DESIRABLE REQUIREMENTS:

- Passion or interest in health and fitness

- Experience in cold outreach on social media using messaging

- Experience in high-ticket appointment setting

- Experience with basic administrative tasks, such as data entry, scheduling, and CRM management



WHAT YOUR DAY-TO-DAY WILL LOOK LIKE:

- You will be expected to find and connect with at least 50 prospects (social media profiles) daily and take them through a messaging sequence to book an appointment with our closers. Our proven strategy allows you to work efficiently.

- You will primarily be using social media messaging.

- In addition, you will research and join social media groups and interact with members and our own
 group.

- You will constantly contact the trainer to submit conversations for review daily.

- You will be expected to track your numbers and submit them daily.

- We provide daily training, and all setters are expected to participate.



HOW MUCH CAN YOU EARN:

Potential Monthly Income: Base pay of $ 600 USD / per month.



START DATE: IMMEDIATELY



APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS: Only applicants with appointment-setting experience will be considered.

Resumes without this background will not be reviewed.



To apply, please send an introduction video highlighting your experience in appointment setting and include a detailed overview of the tasks you performed in this role in your CV.

title: Outreach Specialist - Influencer & Affiliate Recruitment (Full Time, Remote) - $250/month + Bonuses
description:
Outreach Specialist (Full-Time, Remote)



Early-Stage EdTech Startup | Grow With Us



About VocabCartoons



We are VocabCartoons — a newly launched EdTech startup (launched November) creating animated vocabulary stories, games, and fun missions to help children learn English in a visual, ADHD-friendly way.



Our ambition is big.

We are building towards the scale of companies like Duolingo, with the long-term vision of becoming the “Netflix of kids’ learning.”



To make this happen, we are growing an affiliate and influencer network at scale, and we are now hiring Junior Outreach Specialist from the Philippines to join us early and grow with the company. The primary focus of the outreach will be the Indian market, but it may also expand to other countries as needed.



****Role Overview****



Full-time (40 hours/week)



Remote



Long-term



Outreach-focused ONLY

* No design

*No video editing

*No content creation



If you enjoy messaging people, researching influencers, and working towards clear targets in a fast-growing startup, this role is a great fit.



****Salary, Growth & Incentives****



**Base Salary**:

*$250 USD per month



*Performance Bonus:

*$0.50 USD for every new affiliate or influencer who signs up



*** Startup Growth Incentive (Important)***:

As VocabCartoons grows, we reward the people helping to build it.



***For every 1,000 new paying members the company reaches, base salaries are reviewed and increased by at least $50 USD, based on performance and role.***







This role is ideal for people who want to:



Join early



Grow their skills



Be part of something ambitious





Benefit as the company scales



*Probation Period



1-month paid probation





During probation we review:



Reliability



Communication



Outreach quality



Ability to follow templates



Consistency and effort



Successful candidates continue full-time with bonuses.







** Your Daily Responsibilities**



You will work on two core tasks:



1 Influencer Outreach



-Research micro-influencers (parents, teachers, homeschool, ADHD/SEN, education)



-Send DM/email outreach using ready-made templates



-Follow up 2–3 times



-Track replies and conversations



-Organize influencer lists in Google Sheets



2 Affiliate Recruitment



-Find potential affiliate partners



-Message them using provided scripts



-Track sign-ups



-Help new affiliates get started



-Submit daily progress reports







Who We’re Looking For (Please read this carefully)



-Experienced Outreach Specialist / Outreach influencer for at least 6 months -to 1 year



-Good written English



-Fast learner



-Reliable and consistent



-Comfortable with repetitive daily outreach



-Able to follow templates and instructions



-Positive, growth-focused mindset



-Interested in startups and long-term growth









Work Schedule



40 hours per week



Flexible working hours



Ideally 3–4 hours overlap with UK time (not required)







Tools You’ll Use



Google Sheets



Gmail



Instagram / TikTok /
 



Our outreach templates and systems







How to Apply (Important)



Please include the following in your application message:



1. Your CV

2. Screenshot of your internet speed (speedtest.net)

3. A short paragraph:

Why does a startup environment appeal to you?

4. Tell us about your background in being an Outreach specialist / Outreach Influencer

5. Optional but strongly preferred:

A 1-minute Loom video introducing yourself





Test Task (10–15 minutes)





Please complete the following:



1.) Find 5 influencers in any of these niches:



Parents



Homeschool blogs



Teachers



Education content



ADHD / Autism / SEN support



2.) Write 2 outreach messages you would send

3.) Share the links + messages in your application







Applicants who complete the test task go to the TOP of our shortlist.





What Success Looks Like



20–40 influencer/affiliate sign-ups per week



Consistent daily outreach



Accurate tracking



Clear communication



Reliability during probation







This is a long-term role for people who want:



Stability



Growth



Remote work



Performance-based bonuses



A supportive team



The chance to grow with an ambitious startup



We’re excited to work with people who believe in what we’re building.

title: Copywriter / AI Prompter (Funnels Experience Preferred)
description:
Job Overview



We are looking for a skilled Copywriter / AI Prompter who can create high-converting content for our page projects. The ideal candidate should have strong writing skills, understand marketing psychology, and preferably have experience with funnels, landing pages, and conversion-focused copy.



This role requires someone who can work with AI tools such as ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude to generate, refine, and optimize copy while maintaining a natural and persuasive tone.



Key Responsibilities



• Write high-converting copy for landing pages, sales pages, and funnels

• Create and optimize AI prompts for copy generation

• Edit and improve AI-generated content to ensure clarity, tone, and conversions

• Write
 sequences, ad copy, and short-form marketing content

• Conduct basic research on target audience, competitors, and offers

• Follow brand voice and marketing guidelines

• Collaborate with the marketing and design teams

, TikTok, and Applovin ads.

Strong product-market fit

Huge LTV upside

Yes — one million subscribers.

 channel

This is not an execution role.

This is revenue responsibility.



A Cutting-Edge Marketing Team

You’ll join a high-level marketing team that:

Operates at speed

Tests aggressively

Ships fast

Thinks in systems

Is deeply connected to the ecommerce ecosystem

We’re at the forefront of creative testing, acquisition scaling, and brand positioning.

You won’t fight for resources.

You’ll be expected to use them wisely.



Real Economics. Real Scale.

We scale on:

Contribution margin

Clear signal

Long-term retention

Strong unit economics

No vanity metrics.

No fluff.

No ego.



Why This Is Interesting

Men’s underwear is a billion-dollar category with no true dominant retention machine.

We’re building:

Strong branding

Premium positioning

High repeat behavior

Subscription potential

A retention system designed to scale

 is not support.

 is leverage.



Who We’re Looking For

A true retention operator who:

Thinks in lifecycle systems, not campaigns

Speaks in revenue %, not open rate

Has scaled
 to $250k+/month

Understands deep segmentation logic

Knows how to protect deliverability

Can diagnose revenue drops methodically

Wants ownership, not instructions

Is comfortable being accountable for a revenue number

If you’re a “Klaviyo specialist” who executes briefs, this isn’t for you.

If you want to own the retention engine of a future $100M brand — it is.



What We Offer 

Limitless growth ? Access to top-tier masterminds, courses, and elite mentorship.

Full creative freedom ? Experiment, iterate, and set the new industry standard.

Work remotely & flexibly ? We care about results, not where you are.

Competitive salary & performance bonuses ? Get rewarded for exceptional impact.

We are still small, but we are growing fast. Join us now and become part of something BIG.



How to Apply?

Step 3: 30-minute call with the CEO  to discuss scope and long-term growth opportunities.

We carefully review every application and will notify candidates within 2 weeks. If you don’t hear from us, don’t worry - keep an eye out for future opportunities that fit your profile.

Apply now and take your career to the next level!

You are a creative strategist who understands direct-response marketing. You know how to CREATE scroll-stopping creatives that drive measurable results across Meta, TikTok, and YouTube. This role is not just about editing, t’s about understanding conversion psychology, hooks, pacing, and creative strategy.

title: Expat Relocation Coordinator
description:
Now Hiring: Expat Relocation Coordinator (Full-Time | P25,000 Starting Salary)

Help American expats relocate to the Philippines—be their right hand from touchdown to move-in.



About Us

The Savvy Expat is the #1 relocation service for Americans moving to the Philippines. From housing to healthcare, we handle every step of the relocation process so our clients don’t have to stress or get overcharged.



We’re looking for a Relocation Coordinator to join our team and become the bridge between foreign expats and life in the Philippines. This is a full-time, high-trust role for someone who is organized, takes initiative, and understands the ins and outs of local real estate and operations. Background and experience with real estate is required. 



What You’ll Do



Help expats find the right long-term condo or apartment in Metro Manila



Assist in lease negotiations and make sure clients get fair rental rates



Guide clients through opening bank accounts, securing visas, and enrolling in healthcare plans



Coordinate appointments and documents with immigration offices, banks, real estate brokers, and medical providers



Oversee airport pickup, onboarding, and move-in



Provide warm, professional communication via WhatsApp,
, and phone



Ensure a seamless experience from arrival to full relocation



Who We’re Looking For



- Must have real estate experience (at least 1 year in brokerage, leasing, or rentals)

- Must have a valid Philippine Real Estate License (PRC license)

- Speaks and writes fluent English (you’ll be client-facing with Americans)

- Naturally organized, detail-oriented, and process-driven

- Takes initiative without needing micromanagement

- Can juggle multiple clients, deadlines, and moving parts at once

- Comfortable working with high-trust, high-paying foreign clients

- Professional, presentable, and great at building relationships

- Familiar with Metro Manila real estate, especially BGC, Makati, and Pasig (a plus)

- Previous experience in hospitality, customer service, or client operations is a plus



Position Details



Full-time (40 hours/week)



Starting Salary: ?25,000/month (with growth based on performance)



Hybrid setup (some remote work, plus field coordination in Metro Manila)



- Flexible working hours depending on client schedules (this role is task based)



- Growth opportunity within the leading relocation brand in the Philippines



How to Apply

Send your resume, PRC license number, and a short answer to this question:

“Why do you think you’d be a great fit for helping expats relocate to the Philippines?”



We are actively hiring. If you’re a licensed real estate professional who thrives in fast-paced operations, this is your chance to grow with a premium relocation brand!

title: Performance Marketing Lead, Instagram
description:
Instagram Growth Owner — Creator-First Distribution | Performance-First Ownership

Full-time (40 hrs/week) · Remote · $1,200/month + Performance Bonuses



---



ABOUT US



We're a calorie-and-macro-tracking app that feels like taking notes. Type what you ate in plain English (like "eggs toast coffee") or snap a photo and let AI estimate your calories and macros. No database rabbit holes. No friction.



Our landing page: 



We're hiring one person to own Instagram end-to-end with a clear bar: you must be able to produce positive ROI within 10 days.



Important: This is not a "brand social" role. It's not about Meta ad spend. This role is built around a creator-first growth system and distribution multiplication across multiple accounts.



---



WHAT YOU'LL DO



You own all Instagram operations. Here's what that means:



1. Creator Engine (Acquisition)

- Source creators fast: fitness, meal prep, recipes, "what I eat," weight loss, gym niches

- Negotiate performance-based deals with minimal fixed fees and clear deliverables

- Manage quality: scripts, hooks, filming guidelines, edits, posting requirements

- Track outcomes via codes/links; maintain a clean pipeline in Sheets, Airtable, or Notion



2. Distribution Multiplication (Scaling)

- Take winning creator content and expand reach across owned accounts + partner pages

- Turn one winning concept into many variations: new hooks, captions, crops, CTAs

- Operate multiple themed accounts (recipes, meal prep, gym macros, etc.) with consistent cadence

- Stagger posts intelligently — avoid duplication spam and build compounding account trust



3. Creative Iteration (Speed)

- Ship new creatives fast: hooks, scripts, briefs, edits, re-cuts

- Build a "winner playbook" — when something hits, produce 10+ variations quickly

- Maintain a testing cadence that's relentless, measurable, and not vibes-based



4. Outbound Ops (Pipeline)

- Run IG DM and
 outreach to creators, communities, and distribution partners

- Build repeatable templates: outreach, follow-ups, negotiation, contracts, checklists

- Keep your tracker/CRM clean with clear statuses and next actions



---



THE 2 KPIs YOU'LL OWN



KPI #1: Day-10 Instagram Contribution ROI (cROI)

cROI = Instagram-attributed revenue ÷ Instagram total spend (creator costs, editing, tools, boosting if used). Target: break-even or better (cROI ? 1.0) by Day 10, then improve and scale.



KPI #2: Weekly Net-New Paying Subscribers from Instagram (NNPS-IG)

First-time paying subscribers attributed to Instagram via trackable links, codes, or landing pages. Target: grow week-over-week while maintaining KPI #1.



Note: iOS attribution is imperfect. You're expected to build measurement that's honest, consistent, and decision-useful.



---



WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE IN YOUR FIRST 10 DAYS



- A creator pipeline producing consistent deal flow with negotiated terms and scheduled posts

- 10–20 creator videos in motion (live or scheduled) with tracking links/codes

- A functioning distribution network: multiple accounts posting variations, not identical duplicates

- Daily reporting loop: what shipped, what performed, what's being cut, what's being scaled

- At least one repeatable path to cROI ? 1.0 with a plan to scale without ROI collapsing



---



REQUIREMENTS



Must Have:

- Proven, revenue-accountable Instagram growth experience (creators + content systems + distribution)

- Strong fundamentals: hook writing, creative direction, offer positioning, conversion instincts

- Comfort operating under iOS attribution constraints without lying to yourself

- Operator mindset: you ship fast, measure honestly, iterate without a big team



Bonus Points:

- Mobile subscription growth experience (trial-to-paid, payback windows, churn/LTV thinking)

- UGC pipeline building (sourcing + scripting + editing workflow)

- Multi-account content distribution without destroying trust signals

- Strong taste in short-form content — you can feel what holds attention in the first 1–2 seconds



You Do NOT Need:

- Prior experience with a calorie/macro app specifically

- "Influencer marketing" as your only skill — this is an end-to-end growth system role



---



WHAT WE OFFER



- $1,200/month for ~40 hrs/week

- Performance bonuses tied directly to ROI and subscriber growth

- Payment via Wise (twice monthly)

- Shape company culture and growth systems from day one

- Collaborative Estonian team: regular syncs, high ownership, fast decisions

- Fully remote — flexible hours with some overlap for syncs



---



HOW TO APPLY



Start your application with the letter X, then answer these two questions:



1. A short note on how you'd get to positive ROI in 10 days using a creator-first distribution engine (no heavy reliance on paid ads).



2. 1–2 examples of creator-led growth systems you've run. Include: what you shipped, how you tracked results, and how you scaled winners. Link to an IG account you grew or a screenshot of campaign results if you have one.
